channel.title: exchange on Merak.run
channel.description: Recent content in exchange on Merak.run

item.title: Binance
item.description: Binance is an exchange for quickly trading and converting between crypto currencies. Binance allows adding funds via wire transfer, credit card, etc and transfer the assets to other exchanges or wallets.

item.title: Bridge
item.description: A swap is a service that exchanges one asset for another, but sometimes, each asset are on different networks… in this case, a Bridge, allows to move assets from one network to another. Check Swap places for some examples.

item.title: Coinlist
item.description: Coinlist is an exchange for quickly trading and participating in new token sales.. It’s the place selected by many projects to perform their initial token launch and sales, so it’s important to be there. It features a ‘karma’ based system that allows you to be on a priority list when those sales happen, helping you getting closer to secure a slot in the sale before it depletes.

item.title: FTX
item.description: FTX is a recently created exchange with a custom token FTX which has shown very high appreciation. As with other exchanges, it allows to load credit based on different cryptocurrency deposits or traditional banking approaches.

item.title: Gate.io
item.description: Gate.io is an Exchange similar to others published.

item.title: Kucoin
item.description: Kucoin is an exchange for quickly trading and converting between crypto currencies. Kucoin allows adding funds via wire transfer, credit card, etc and transfer the assets to other exchanges or wallets. It also features Polygon/MATIC purchases

item.title: KYC
item.description: KYC is the acronym of ‘Know your customer’. It is a process that is used to verify the identity of a customer. It usually involves asking for National ID Card, passport or driving licence as well as some utility bills to prove your name and address. It’s used as a way to avoid duplicate accounts and to prevent fraud.

item.title: MEXC
item.description: MEXC is an exchange for trading. It was the first one to accept ALEPH ZERO tokens to be shared.
